articles.author: Mark Rendell, Salmaan Farooqui
articles.title: Trucking companies lose drivers as new border vaccine mandate comes into force - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: Canadian truckers must be fully vaccinated if they want to avoid quarantine when returning from U.S., while unvaccinated American drivers are not allowed into Canada
articles.content: David Phillips, truck driver and Long Combination Vehicle Instructor for Bison Transport, hooks up a turnpike double trailer during a snow storm in Winnipeg Friday, April 3, 2020.JOHN WOODS/The Globe… [+5136 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Celine Dion cancels North American tour over ongoing health concerns - ABC News
articles.description: After an extended pause, Celine Dion is forced to cancel the North American leg of her world tour over a longer-than-expected recovery from muscle spasms.
articles.content:
Canadian superstar Celine Dion has announced she will not be able to perform the North America leg of her "Courage World Tour" due to persistent health problems.

articles.title: UK's Prince Harry seeks right to pay for UK police protection - CNA
articles.description:
LONDON: Britain's Prince Harry is challenging a government decision that he should not receive police protection when on British soil even if he covers the cost himself, his legal representatives said.
